text:
[Verse]
Stars in the dark sky
Whispers in the breeze
Footsteps on a lonely path
Lost among the trees

[Verse 2]
Moonlight paints the ground
Shadows come alive
Heartbeat echoes all around
Wishing you were by my side

[Chorus]
Lost in the night feeling so free
Wandering through dreams just you and me
Lost in the night where we belong
Singing our own silent song

[Verse 3]
Owls call from afar
Leaves rustle the way
Nighttime hides where we are
Until the break of day

[Verse 4]
Fading footsteps trace
Paths we never planned
In this quiet midnight space
I want to hold your hand

[Chorus]
Lost in the night feeling so free
Wandering through dreams just you and me
Lost in the night where we belong
Singing our own silent song
title: Lost in the Night
